inputs.break_ratio_policy: ratio_lo defaults to 1/ratio_hi (symmetric inverse) unless overridden
inputs.forbid_mask_scope_note: applies forbid mask ONLY when entry_mode == 'bb'

gonogo_thresholds.rationale: stop rule: leverage must not degrade sharpe, must not worsen drawdown, and must add >=1% CAGR vs base in post segment

inputs.maintenance_ratio_semantics: maint_ratio = equity / (lever_shares*price) (account equity vs lever leg notional; v26 default)

rv20_filter.block_rule: block entry when isfinite(rv20) & isfinite(q60) & rv20 > q60; else allow
rv20_filter.note: This is a defensive filter to avoid opening leverage in elevated realized vol regimes.

audit.maintenance_ratio_semantics: maint_ratio = equity / (lever_shares*price) (account equity vs lever leg notional; v26 default)
audit.maintenance_margin_interest_order: Interest accrues at start of bar BEFORE maintenance check; margin_call decision uses post-interest cash/equity for that date.
audit.hold_days_semantics: entry day sets hold_days=0; increments by 1 each subsequent row while in position
audit.hold_days_exit_recording: normal exit records hold_days after increment (>=1 on first exit day); margin_call also records hold_days+1 on trigger day for consistency (v26.2).
audit.same_day_reentry: blocked (exited_today flag); entry is skipped on the same bar after any exit
audit.interest_semantics: row-based accrual while in position; charged before exit on the exit date; timing assumption: close at end-of-day on exit date
audit.timing_assumption: assume close-at-EOD on exit date; interest charged for that day before exit
audit.end_of_data_policy: if open position exists at end, force-close and record trade with exit_reason=end_of_data
audit.lever_leg_pnl_semantics: gross PnL for leverage leg (proceeds - principal); net_after_costs = lever_leg_pnl - interest_paid - cost_paid
audit.cost_on_semantics: cost_on='lever' charges costs on lever leg notional only. cost_on='all' charges costs on (base+lever) notional for entry/exit as a conservative upper bound; base leg is held (not liquidated) but still counted in cost_on='all'.
audit.slippage_model: cash penalty = notional * slip_rate per side; slip_rate = slip_bps * 1e-4
audit.leverage_definition: lever_shares_target = base_shares(t0) * leverage_frac; not rebalanced => effective leverage drifts with price

segmentation.notes: Each segment equity is normalized to 1.0 at its own start (base_shares=1/segment_first_price). Segment results are NOT chainable into a single continuous equity curve.

rv20_filter.block_rule: block entry when isfinite(rv20) & isfinite(q60) & rv20 > q60; else allow
rv20_filter.note: This is a defensive filter to avoid opening leverage in elevated realized vol regimes.

audit.forbid_mask_semantics: for each break idx b: forbid entry i in [b-contam_horizon, b+z_clear_days-1]

notes: Segments are normalized independently (equity starts at 1.0 in each segment).
Compare block is a summary delta, not a continuous equity backtest across split.

segmentation.compute_cost_note: Per strategy: full + pre + post backtests (3x). Not optimized in v26.2.

interpretation.NO_GO: All three post conditions met: stop / do not deploy / do not tune further.
interpretation.GO_OR_REVIEW: Stop rule NOT triggered. This is NOT a PASS. It only means the specific immediate stop rule did not fire.

reasons: all 3 post conditions met => stop / do not deploy

thresholds.rationale: stop rule: leverage must not degrade sharpe, must not worsen drawdown, and must add >=1% CAGR vs base in post segment

segmentation.compute_cost_note: Per strategy: full + pre + post backtests (3x). Not optimized in v26.2.

interpretation.NO_GO: All three post conditions met: stop / do not deploy / do not tune further.
interpretation.GO_OR_REVIEW: Stop rule NOT triggered. This is NOT a PASS. It only means the specific immediate stop rule did not fire.

thresholds.rationale: stop rule: leverage must not degrade sharpe, must not worsen drawdown, and must add >=1% CAGR vs base in post segment

rv20_filter.block_rule: block entry when isfinite(rv20) & isfinite(q60) & rv20 > q60; else allow
rv20_filter.note: This is a defensive filter to avoid opening leverage in elevated realized vol regimes.

audit.maintenance_ratio_semantics: maint_ratio = equity / (lever_shares*price) (account equity vs lever leg notional; v26 default)
audit.maintenance_margin_interest_order: Interest accrues at start of bar BEFORE maintenance check; margin_call decision uses post-interest cash/equity for that date.
audit.hold_days_semantics: entry day sets hold_days=0; increments by 1 each subsequent row while in position
audit.hold_days_exit_recording: normal exit records hold_days after increment (>=1 on first exit day); margin_call also records hold_days+1 on trigger day for consistency (v26.2).
audit.same_day_reentry: blocked (exited_today flag); entry is skipped on the same bar after any exit
audit.interest_semantics: row-based accrual while in position; charged before exit on the exit date; timing assumption: close at end-of-day on exit date
audit.timing_assumption: assume close-at-EOD on exit date; interest charged for that day before exit
audit.end_of_data_policy: if open position exists at end, force-close and record trade with exit_reason=end_of_data
audit.lever_leg_pnl_semantics: gross PnL for leverage leg (proceeds - principal); net_after_costs = lever_leg_pnl - interest_paid - cost_paid
audit.cost_on_semantics: cost_on='lever' charges costs on lever leg notional only. cost_on='all' charges costs on (base+lever) notional for entry/exit as a conservative upper bound; base leg is held (not liquidated) but still counted in cost_on='all'.
audit.slippage_model: cash penalty = notional * slip_rate per side; slip_rate = slip_bps * 1e-4
audit.leverage_definition: lever_shares_target = base_shares(t0) * leverage_frac; not rebalanced => effective leverage drifts with price

leverage.mdd_warning: equity went negative; mdd < -1.0 is arithmetically valid but may be misleading

segmentation.notes: Each segment equity is normalized to 1.0 at its own start (base_shares=1/segment_first_price). Segment results are NOT chainable into a single continuous equity curve.

rv20_filter.block_rule: block entry when isfinite(rv20) & isfinite(q60) & rv20 > q60; else allow
rv20_filter.note: This is a defensive filter to avoid opening leverage in elevated realized vol regimes.

audit.end_of_data_policy: if open position exists at end, force-close and record trade with exit_reason=end_of_data
audit.lever_leg_pnl_semantics: gross PnL for leverage leg (proceeds - principal); net_after_costs = lever_leg_pnl - interest_paid - cost_paid
audit.cost_on_semantics: cost_on='lever' charges costs on lever leg notional only. cost_on='all' charges costs on (base+lever) notional for entry/exit as a conservative upper bound; base leg is held (not liquidated) but still counted in cost_on='all'.
audit.slippage_model: cash penalty = notional * slip_rate per side; slip_rate = slip_bps * 1e-4
audit.leverage_definition: lever_shares_target = base_shares(t0) * leverage_frac; not rebalanced => effective leverage drifts with price
audit.forbid_mask_semantics: for each break idx b: forbid entry i in [b-contam_horizon, b+z_clear_days-1]
audit.forbid_mask_scope_note: applies forbid mask ONLY when entry_mode == 'bb'

audit.forbid_mask_semantics: for each break idx b: forbid entry i in [b-contam_horizon, b+z_clear_days-1]
audit.forbid_mask_scope_note: applies forbid mask ONLY when entry_mode == 'bb'

notes: Segments are normalized independently (equity starts at 1.0 in each segment).
Compare block is a summary delta, not a continuous equity backtest across split.

segmentation.compute_cost_note: Per strategy: full + pre + post backtests (3x). Not optimized in v26.2.

interpretation.NO_GO: All three post conditions met: stop / do not deploy / do not tune further.
interpretation.GO_OR_REVIEW: Stop rule NOT triggered. This is NOT a PASS. It only means the specific immediate stop rule did not fire.

thresholds.rationale: stop rule: leverage must not degrade sharpe, must not worsen drawdown, and must add >=1% CAGR vs base in post segment

rv20_filter.block_rule: block entry when isfinite(rv20) & isfinite(q60) & rv20 > q60; else allow
rv20_filter.note: This is a defensive filter to avoid opening leverage in elevated realized vol regimes.

audit.maintenance_ratio_semantics: maint_ratio = equity / (lever_shares*price) (account equity vs lever leg notional; v26 default)
audit.maintenance_margin_interest_order: Interest accrues at start of bar BEFORE maintenance check; margin_call decision uses post-interest cash/equity for that date.
audit.hold_days_semantics: entry day sets hold_days=0; increments by 1 each subsequent row while in position
audit.hold_days_exit_recording: normal exit records hold_days after increment (>=1 on first exit day); margin_call also records hold_days+1 on trigger day for consistency (v26.2).
audit.same_day_reentry: blocked (exited_today flag); entry is skipped on the same bar after any exit
audit.interest_semantics: row-based accrual while in position; charged before exit on the exit date; timing assumption: close at end-of-day on exit date
audit.timing_assumption: assume close-at-EOD on exit date; interest charged for that day before exit
audit.end_of_data_policy: if open position exists at end, force-close and record trade with exit_reason=end_of_data
audit.lever_leg_pnl_semantics: gross PnL for leverage leg (proceeds - principal); net_after_costs = lever_leg_pnl - interest_paid - cost_paid
audit.cost_on_semantics: cost_on='lever' charges costs on lever leg notional only. cost_on='all' charges costs on (base+lever) notional for entry/exit as a conservative upper bound; base leg is held (not liquidated) but still counted in cost_on='all'.
audit.slippage_model: cash penalty = notional * slip_rate per side; slip_rate = slip_bps * 1e-4
audit.leverage_definition: lever_shares_target = base_shares(t0) * leverage_frac; not rebalanced => effective leverage drifts with price

leverage.mdd_warning: equity went negative; mdd < -1.0 is arithmetically valid but may be misleading

segmentation.notes: Each segment equity is normalized to 1.0 at its own start (base_shares=1/segment_first_price). Segment results are NOT chainable into a single continuous equity curve.

interpretation.NO_GO: All three post conditions met: stop / do not deploy / do not tune further.

compare.ranking_policy: prefer post (calmar desc, sharpe0 desc) when post_ok=true; else fallback to full; EXCLUDE hard_fail

notes: Hard-fail strategies are excluded from ranking.
Maintenance margin forced close approximates margin call at EOD on trigger bar; intraday is not modeled.
Maintenance ratio thresholds are NOT interchangeable across maint_ratio_mode values.
JSON output is sanitized: NaN/Inf are converted to null; allow_nan=False enforced.
v26.5+: RV20 entry filter is enabled for BB mode (defensive).
v26.6: hard_fail scope='post' still enforces full_floor.
